author: vsiveton
msg: MDOAP-1: DOAP Plugin should support setting of shortdesc and pmc and the about default should be http://${project.artifactId}.rdf.apache.org

author: aroush
msg: LUCENENET-117: Bug in Lucene.Net.Index.DocumentsWriter.AppendPostings when compiled in release-mode

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-3536] Upgrading to new plexus-interpolation release to enable path translation as a post-processing step when resolving an individual expression inside the pom. post-processing will happen after a given expression is resolved recursively, and will act on the resulting value.

author: dbertoni
msg: Fixed some breakages in grammar serialization on platforms where sizeof(unsigned int) != sizeof(XMLSize_t).
